text: Aryeh Makhlouf Deri, Hebrew: אריה מכלוף דרעי , (born 17 February 1959 in Meknès) is an Israeli politician. He is political leader of Shas. He helped start this party. Deri was a Member of Knesset from 1992 to 1999. He returned in parliament in 2013. In the Fourth Netanyahu Government he was minister of the Development of Galilee and the Negev, and also interior minister. In the Fifth Netanyahu Government he had the same position. He has had several government positions before this. In 2000 he was sent to prison because of financial crimes. == References == * Bio at Knesset Website Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:Israeli political leaders Category:Israeli prisoners Category:Jewish Israeli criminals Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Moroccan Jews Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Shas politicians Category:Moroccan politicians
title: Aryeh Deri
